Package dataBase

Interface GeneralPersistency<T extends BusinessObject>

Type Parameters:
T - a class extending BusinessObject, with methods like getID() and getAllValues()
All Known Subinterfaces:
IdentifiablePersistency<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientXMLManipulation, ContainerXMLManipulation, HistoryXMLManipulation, PortXMLManipulation
public interface GeneralPersistency<T extends BusinessObject>
The interface for all databases
Author:
simon

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void newEntry​(T data)
    Creates a new entry in the database, saving the object.
    java.util.List<T> searchEntries​(java.lang.String searchWord)
    Returns all entries in the database with value(s) containing the search word
    void wipe()
    Resets the database.

  • Method Details

    • newEntry

      void newEntry​(T data)
      Creates a new entry in the database, saving the object.
      Parameters:
      data - - the object to be saved

    • searchEntries

      java.util.List<T> searchEntries​(java.lang.String searchWord)
      Returns all entries in the database with value(s) containing the search word
      Parameters:
      searchWord -
      Returns:
      a list of all matching entries, converted into domain objects

    • wipe

      void wipe()
      Resets the database. I. e. clears all entries
